messages.message:
Hi Team, we will start collecting CI metrics on master (and expand to major release branches soon) to better track CI performance and various issues we’ve been recently observing in CI. The metrics we measure are:
• Total CI runtime, what tests passed and failed, test error messages, total build time (including time taken for docker image pull and golang deps installation)
This adds ~ 3mins to the total CI runtime.

You can find these metrics on Testmo: https://instabase.testmo.net/automation/runs/9
Please let me know if there’s any issue/question regarding the above. Thank you!
Will this include metrics for pre-merge tests?
Oh yea, by CI, I mean pre-merge tests
